ARABIC: فَنَادَىٰهَا مِن تَحْتِهَآ أَلَّا تَحْزَنِى قَدْ جَعَلَ رَبُّكِ تَحْتَكِ سَرِيًّا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: A voice called out to her from under her, 'Do not grieve! Your Lord has placed a small stream at your feet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Then (a voice) called to her from below: "Grieve not; your Lord has made a rivulet gush forth right below you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Thereupon the angel below her cried out: "Grieve not, for your Lord has caused a stream of water to flow beneath you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Then she heard the baby saying, "Do not be sad. Your Lord has caused a stream to run at your feet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: (The angel) Therefore called her from below her, “Do not grieve – your Lord has made a river flow below you.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then he cried unto her from below her, saying: "Grieve not: your Lord has provided a Sariy under you."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then (the child) called out to her from beneath her: Grieve not, surely your Lord has made a stream to flow beneath you;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: But the one that was below her called to her, 'Nay, do not sorrow; see, thy Lord has set below thee a rivulet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then (one) cried unto her from below her, saying: Grieve not! Thy Lord hath placed a rivulet beneath thee,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: But a voice called out to her from below, "Do not despair. Your Lord has provided a brook that runs at your feet,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then one cried unto her from underneath her, that grieve not, thy Lord hath placed underneath thou a rivulet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Thereupon he called her from below her [saying,] ‘Do not grieve! Your Lord has made a spring to flow at your feet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But (a voice) cried to her from beneath the (palm-tree): "Grieve not! for thy Lord hath provided a rivulet beneath thee;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then [the babe 'Iesa (Jesus) or Jibrael (Gabriel)] cried unto her from below her, saying: "Grieve not! Your Lord has provided a water stream under you;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He called from below to her: 'Do not sorrow, look, your Lord has provided a rivulet below you,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Whereupon he called her from beneath her: “Do not worry; your Lord has placed a stream beneath you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But he called her from below her, "Do not grieve; your Lord has provided beneath you a stream.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [19:24] Then he called her from below her, namely, Gabriel — for he was lower than her, ‘Do not grieve. Your Lord has made below you a rivulet, a river of water, which had dried up.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then (one) cried unto her from below her) i.e. Gabriel, (saying: Grieve not) Mary over the birth of Jesus! (Thy Lord hath placed a rivulet beneath thee) a prophet beneath you; it is also said that this means: Jesus cried unto her from beneath her: grieve not your Lord has placed a stream beneath you,
